FAQ / Custom Cards / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
NOTE: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Never A Dull Moment

  1. Can I play this card if I don’t have a Wrecker on my team? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes.
  2. Can I play this card if my opponent doesn’t have any Secret Actions in play? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes.
  3. When I play this card, do I have to do one damage to one of my Wreckers? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    No, you do not. The “may” makes this an optional ability.
  4. When I play this card, can I do 1 damage to one of my Wreckers if my opponent doesn’t have a Secret Action in play? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes.
  5. When I play this card and I have a Specialist, do I have to make my opponent scrap a card? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes. This ability isn’t optional.
  6. Can my opponent scrap the Secret Action for the second ability that I returned to their hand with the first ability? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes. Abilities on the card happen in order.
